column3: Forgive me, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>madam<Else/>sir</If>, but the House of Splendors does not accept unsolicited submissions. Pray speak with Lydirlona if you would like to become one of our suppliers.
A thousand pardons, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>madam<Else/>sir</If>, but I am only permitted to deal with those who are registered with the House.
Sorry, but we don't accept wares from just anyone. You must become one of our trusted suppliers first.
Sorry, but we're only allowed to do business with them as the House knows.
My sincerest apologies, but I can only accept wares from those who are in good standing with the House.
Ah, as much as I'd like to assist you, we can only do business with referred individuals.
My apologies, but we are not taking on new suppliers at present. This is an interim measure to improve the experience of those artisans already on our roster.
My apologies, <If(PlayerParameter(4))>miss<Else/>sir</If>, but we are only permitted to conduct business with referred individuals.
I'm terribly sorry, but we are unable to accommodate new suppliers at present. This is an interim measure to improve the experience of those artisans already on our roster.
Certain items previously accepted by collectable appraisers can no longer be crafted as collectables.
If you are in possession of these items, please submit them to the collectable dealer in Mor Dhona at Revenant's Toll.
Certain items previously accepted by collectable appraisers can no longer be gathered as collectables.
If you are in possession of these items, please submit them to the collectable dealer in Mor Dhona at Revenant's Toll.
Certain items previously accepted by collectable appraisers can no longer be crafted or gathered as collectables.
If you are in possession of these items, please submit them to the collectable dealer in Mor Dhona at Revenant's Toll.
